# captureStreams()

**Instance Method**

Completes any already enqueued reads and writes, and then invokes the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionStreamDelegate/urlSession(_:streamTask:didBecome:outputStream:)] delegate message.

## Declaration

```swift
func captureStreams()
```
title: captureStreams()
